byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris, and Richard Martyn-Hemphill from London.
byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and LILIA BLAISE

abstract: Union of Muslims of the Alpes-Maritimes says over one-third of victims killed in terrorist attack in Nice, France, were Muslim.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for the rampage, but it took a heavy toll on Muslims, who numbered at least 30 of the 84 killed.

headline.main: A Third of Nice Truck Attack’s Dead Were Muslim, Group Says
headline.print_headline: Truck Attack in Nice Claimed Many Muslim Lives

snippet: The Islamic State has claimed responsibility for the rampage, but it took a heavy toll on Muslims, who numbered at least 30 of the 84 killed....

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
